name: Need for Fish
description:
Its a game about fishing… And racing. 
game by Joh

Part of LD41  vote here

Can be played fully with Space only!!!

  • space to cast
  • space to wheel back with no fish (to recast or rebait)
  • space to wheel back with fish (release when red)

M to mute

I would even say its easy to play, hard to master!!
Different fish have different behaviors!

ported after jam end,
